name: Big30
description: '''Rodney Lamont Wright Jr.'''  (born December 28, 1999), better known by his stage name '''Big30''' (stylized as '''BIG30'''), is an [[Rapping|American rapper]] from [[Memphis, Tennessee]]. He is best known for his guest appearance on fellow Memphis rapper [[Pooh Shiesty]]'s 2021 single "[[Neighbors (Pooh Shiesty song)|Neighbors]]", which peaked at number 51 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. Big30's debut mixtape, ''King of Killbranch'' (2021) includes guest appearances from [[Lil Durk]], [[Future (rapper)|Future]], [[Quavo]], [[Moneybagg Yo]], [[Pooh Shiesty]], Big Homiie G, [[Yo Gotti]], and [[Offset (rapper)|Offset]].
